name: Lizardfolk
description: Lizardfolk are bipedal humanoids with reptilian traits, including scaled skin, tails, and sharp teeth. They are pragmatic and resourceful, with even the color of their scales adapting to the environment they find themselves in. Many embrace a survivalist mindset, using their keen senses and natural agility to thrive and seek the glory of bringing down prey that are many times larger in size than themselves.

options.name: Variable Size
options.description: Lizardfolk come in a variety of sizes. Choose yours:

subchoices.name: Small
subchoices.description: You are a small creature. All of your finesse skills are upgraded and your physique skills downgraded. You also have a -1 penalty to movement speed.

subchoices.name: Medium
subchoices.description: You are a medium creature, suffering no penalty or bonus related to your size.

subchoices.name: Large
subchoices.description: You are a large creature. All of your physique skills are upgraded and your finesse skills downgraded. Additionally, you take up a 2x2 unit area.

options.name: Reptilian Anatomy
options.description: Lizardfolk have several benefits. You have infravision up to a moderate (20 units) distance and regenerate any missing limbs if you complete a full rest at your maximum health.

options.name: Action : Snapjaw
options.description: You make a modified unarmed attack against a creature with a bonus dice, dealing 3 physical damage for the primary dice and any extra dice that hit. If this attack deals 6 or more damage after calculating mitigation, the target gains the bleeding condition.

options.name: Cold Blooded
options.description: Lizardfolk cannot regulate their temperature as effectively as warm-blooded creatures. You suffer a -4 penalty to your cold mitigation.
